Uses of Class
org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResponse

  • Packages that use CoapResponse 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.californium.core  

    • Uses of CoapResponse in org.eclipse.californium.core

      Methods in org.eclipse.californium.core that return CoapResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoapResponse CoapClient.advanced(Request request)
      Sends an advanced synchronous request that has to be configured by the developer.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.delete()
      Sends a DELETE request and waits for the response.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.get()
      Sends a GET request and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.get(int accept)
      Sends a GET request with the specified Accept option and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapObserveRelation.getCurrent()
      Gets the current notification or null if none has arrived yet.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.post(byte[] payload, int format)
      Sends a POST request with the specified payload and the specified content format option and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.post(byte[] payload, int format, int accept)
      Sends a POST request with the specified payload, the specified content format and the specified Accept option and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.post(String payload, int format)
      Sends a POST request with the specified payload and the specified content format option and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.post(String payload, int format, int accept)
      Sends a POST request with the specified payload, the specified content format and the specified Accept option and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.put(byte[] payload, int format)
      Sends a PUT request with payload and required Content-Format and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.put(String payload, int format)
      Sends a PUT request with payload and required Content-Format and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.putIfMatch(byte[] payload, int format, byte[]... etags)
      Sends a PUT request with with the specified ETags in the If-Match option and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.putIfMatch(String payload, int format, byte[]... etags)
      Sends a PUT request with with the specified ETags in the If-Match option and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.putIfNoneMatch(byte[] payload, int format)
      Sends a PUT request with the If-None-Match option set and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.putIfNoneMatch(String payload, int format)
      Sends a PUT request with the If-None-Match option set and blocks until the response is available.
      CoapResponse CoapClient.validate(byte[]... etags)

      void CoapHandler.onLoad(CoapResponse response)
      Invoked when a CoAP response or notification has arrived.
